short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks ads of the most popular websites of nepal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks advertisements from popular websites in nepal. Currently only two sites, but we will continue to add more sites on request. The code is maintained opensource and you can see and use the code. You can also contribute to the code and see more content free of advertising.
